sentences.en: "You must come to Tinsley's graduation party." — "I'd be delighted."
sentences.cn: “你一定要来参加廷斯利的毕业聚会。”——“我很乐意。”

sentences.en: Everybody was delighted to see her.
Generations of adults and children have delighted in the story.
sentences.cn: 一代又一代的成年人和儿童都很喜欢这个故事。

sentences.en: He delighted in sharing his love of birds with children.
sentences.cn: 他喜欢与孩子们分享他对鸟类的热爱。

sentences.en: He said that he was delighted with the public response.
sentences.cn: 他说公众的反应让他欣喜。

sentences.en: He was delighted to coax the monoplane to 330 m.p.h.
sentences.cn: 这架单翼飞机在他的摆弄下时速达到了每小时330英里，他感到很高兴。

sentences.en: He was grinning proudly, delighted with his achievements.
sentences.cn: 他为自己的成就感到喜悦,自豪地咧着嘴笑.

sentences.en: Her screams of delighted laughter filled the air.
sentences.cn: 她喜悦的尖叫声在空中荡漾。

sentences.en: I know Frank will be delighted to see you.
sentences.cn: 我知道弗兰克见到你会很高兴的。

sentences.en: I was delighted to hear the news of your success.
sentences.cn: 听到你成功了的消息时我非常高兴.

sentences.en: I'd be absolutely delighted to come.
Sayer was delighted with the smoothness of the engine.
sentences.cn: 塞耶对发动机平稳流畅的运转很是满意。

sentences.en: She delighted in the nickname, the "iron lady".
sentences.cn: 她喜爱这个昵称——“铁娘子”。

sentences.en: She stood preening in their midst, delighted with the attention.
sentences.cn: 她得意洋洋地站在他们中间，为受人瞩目而高兴。

sentences.en: The delighted pensioner walked off with a £2,000 prize.
sentences.cn: 那个退休老人轻松赢得了2,000英镑的奖金，高兴得不得了。

sentences.en: The news will have delighted detractors of the scheme.
sentences.cn: 这条消息会让该方案的批评者感到高兴。

words.tran_cn: 可爱的，可喜的；令人愉快的

trans.tran_cn: 使…兴高采烈；感到快乐（delight的过去分词）
